contentPane.div: Research Interests My research focuses on the development of new computational methods and efficient algorithms to help answer fundamental questions in evolutionary biology. I am especially interested in problems related to understanding gene family and genome evolution, and accurately reconstructing organismal phylogenies. Please visit my personal webpage for further details: http://people.csail.mit.edu/mukul

rightPane.div:
Mukul Bansal Postdoctoral Associate
